query-mapping.description: The list of posts for the blog administrator.

class.name: AWA.Blogs.Models.Admin_Post_Info
class.comment: The Admin_Post_Info describes a post in the administration interface.

query.name: blog-admin-post-list
query.comment: Get the list of blog posts
query.sql: SELECT post.id, post.title, post.uri, post.create_date, post.status, user.name FROM awa_blog as blog INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = blog.id AND acl.entity_type = :table AND acl.user_id = :user_id INNER JOIN awa_post AS post ON blog.id = post.blog_id INNER JOIN awa_user AS user ON post.author_id = user.id WHERE blog.id = :blog_id
